Description_lang: Increases your out-of-combat regeneration in the outdoors, normal dungeons and battlegrounds.

description_blz.en_US: Increases your out-of-combat regeneration in the outdoors, normal dungeons and battlegrounds.
description_blz.es_MX: Aumenta tu regeneración fuera de combate en exteriores, calabozos normales y campos de batalla.
description_blz.pt_BR: Aumenta a regeneração fora de combate em ambientes externos, masmorras normais e campos de batalha.
description_blz.de_DE: Erhöht in Außengebieten, in normalen Dungeons und auf Schlachtfeldern Eure Regeneration außerhalb des Kampfes.
description_blz.en_GB: Increases your out-of-combat regeneration in the outdoors, normal dungeons and battlegrounds.
description_blz.es_ES: Aumenta tu regeneración fuera de combate en zonas exteriores, mazmorras normales y campos de batalla.
description_blz.fr_FR: Augmente votre régénération hors combat dans les zones extérieures, les donjons et les champs de bataille en mode normal.
description_blz.it_IT: Aumenta la rigenerazione quando non si è in combattimento all'esterno, nelle spedizioni e nei campi di battaglia.
description_blz.ru_RU: Ускоряет регенерацию вне боя на открытой местности, в обычных подземельях и на полях боя.
description_blz.ko_KR: 야외, 일반적인 던전, 전장에서 비전투 상태 시 재생력이 증가합니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 提高你脫離戰鬥後，在戶外、普通地城及戰場的恢復速度。
description_blz.zh_CN: 在户外、普通地下城和战场时，提高你脱离战斗后的恢复速度。
